title: FS: 1909-11 T206 Piedmont 350 Harry Krause (Portrait) PSA NM 7
author: Epps

posts.post_title: FS: 1909-11 T206 Piedmont 350 Harry Krause (Portrait) PSA NM 7
posts.post_content:
For sale today is one of the highest graded Krause Portrait's known. Graded PSA 7, there are only 9 at this level and 5 graded higher. A different Krause pose in a PSA 7 sold for $986 in October. The card is sharp. $600 delivered and insured. PM or email me at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or offers. 

$575 delivered and insured
